name: ReggieNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill tells you the latest articles from Reggie News. All you need to use this is a Alexa device. Just ask “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” and you can hear all the new memes on Reggie News.
Reggie News is available online at https://reggie.ga/news
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
